attributes.description: Immaculate Land Cruiser V8 Diesel D/Cab. Still under factory warranty with fsh. Extended Warranty till 2027. With, Onca replacement bumpers front and back, Onca rock sliders, Onca roof racks, dual battery system and solar ready, Full OME suspension, Front spacers on suspension and extended schackles, Onca belly plate, Onca side mirror brackets. Bushtech canopy, ARB tracks mounted on canopy with high lift jack. 12000 pound winch and Bushranger 8000 lumens per light. 5 Alloy wheels with BF 305/65/17 Tyres. Upgraded 900nm clutch and 2nd and 5th gear upgrade. Leather, onca roof and centre console. Long Range tank. many more extras. Full Rockford sound system with water and sound proofing. Will supply full list on enquiry. Extras valued at R445000.00
